member.summary: Adds the specified value to the collection. O(log N)

member.summary: Removes the specified key value from the collection. O(log N)

member.summary: Gets the index of the first item greater than the specified value. O(log N), move next: O(1)
member.param: The value for which to find the index.

member.summary: Gets the index of the last item less than the specified key. O(log N), move next: O(1)

member.name: M:Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1.WhereGreaterOrEqual(`0)
member.summary: Get all items equal to or greater than the specified value, starting with the lowest index and moving forwards. O(log N), move next: O(1)
member.returns: All items having values equal to or greater than the specified value.

member.name: M:Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1.WhereLessOrEqualBackwards(`0)
member.summary: Get all items less than or equal to the specified value, starting with the highest index and moving backwards. O(log N), move next: O(1)
member.returns: All items having values equal to or greater than the specified value.

member.name: M:Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1.BackwardFromIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all items starting at the index, and moving backward. O(log N), move next: O(1)

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.TrimStart(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Char[])
member.summary: Removes all leading occurrences of a set of characters specified in an array from the current object.
member.param: An array of Unicode characters to remove, or null.
member.returns: The object that contains a list of characters that remains after all occurrences of the characters in the parameter are removed from the end of the current string. If is null or an empty array, Unicode white-space characters are removed instead.

member.returns: The object that contains a list of characters that remains after all occurrences of the characters in the parameter are removed from the end of the current string. If is null or an empty array, Unicode white-space characters are removed instead.

member.returns: The zero-based index position of the last occurrence in this instance where any character in was found; -1 if no character in was found.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.LastIndexOfAny(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Char[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Reports the zero-based index of the last occurrence in this instance of any character in a specified array of Unicode characters. The search starts at a specified character position.
member.param: A Unicode character array containing one or more characters to seek.
member.returns: The zero-based index position of the last occurrence in this instance where any character in was found; -1 if no character in was found.
member.exception: is negative.-or- is greater than the number of characters in this instance.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.LastIndexOfAny(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reports the zero-based index of the last occurrence in this instance of any character in a specified array of Unicode characters. The search starts at a specified character position and examines a specified number of character positions.
member.param: A Unicode character array containing one or more characters to seek.
The number of character positions to examine.
member.returns: The zero-based index position of the last occurrence in this instance where any character in was found; -1 if no character in was found.
member.exception: or is negative. -or- + is greater than the number of characters in this instance.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.StartsWith(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance of starts with the specified string.
member.param: true to ignore case during the comparison; otherwise, false.
member.returns: true if the parameter matches the beginning of this string; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.EndsWith(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance of ends with the specified string.
member.param: The string to compare to the substring at the end of this instance.
true to ignore case during the comparison; otherwise, false.
member.returns: true if the parameter matches the beginning of this string; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.ToLower(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Returns a converted to lowercase.
member.returns: The converted to lowercase.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.ToLower(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Returns a converted to lowercase, using the casing rules of the specified culture.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific casing rules.
member.returns: The converted to lowercase using specified culture.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.ToLowerInvariant(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Returns a converted to lowercase, using the casing rules of the invarian culture.
member.returns: The converted to lowercase using invariant culture.

member.returns: The converted to uppercase.

member.returns: The converted to uppercase using specified culture.

member.name: M:System.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.ToUpperInvariant(System.Text.StringBuilder)
